name: utilities/resolve
description: Utility to transform an object recursively for searches subqueries, templating, email creation, file loading/creation, array merging/sorting/ordering, object flattening.

parameters.name: data.template
parameters.description: Freemarker template to render with the data found on all sibling properties. Use the property name to access the data in the template. The rendered string is returned.

parameters.name: data.boolean
parameters.description: Returns true if all sibling properties are truthy. Array values must all be truthy to pass. Setting to false passes when all values are falsey.

parameters.name: data.array
parameters.description: Concatenates and all property arrays as a single array. If array is a string, the concatenated array is sorted by that property.

parameters.name: data.sort
parameters.description: Sort the concatenated array by this property before returning.

parameters.name: data.join
parameters.description: Join the concatenated array before returning as a string. If join is a string, that value is used as the seperator.

parameters.name: data.file
parameters.description: Loads and returns a file when this is a path string or internalid number. If file is a file extension, a file is created from the content property and is returned.

parameters.name: data.contents
parameters.description: Content of the file to create. If the file option is 'pdf', the content is converted from xml to pdf before creating.

parameters.name: data.name
parameters.description: Name of the file to create. If no name is defined, name is set to the title xml tag found in the content property.

parameters.name: data.record
parameters.description: Returns either a record search or loaded record of this record type.

parameters.name: data.id
parameters.description: Loads and the record with this internalid.

parameters.name: data.map
parameters.description: Searches the record using this field map.

parameters.name: data.form
parameters.description: Extends the map property with all fields found on a form.

parameters.name: data.body
parameters.description: When body and recipients properties are present, consider this an email definition.

parameters.name: data.recipients
parameters.description: When body and recipients properties are present, consider this an email definition.

parameters.name: data.subject
parameters.description: When no email subject is defined, subject is set to the title tag found in the body property.

parameters.name: data.options
parameters.description: The option in the array with the lowest value for the selected property has selected set to true. All other options have selected removed.
